pipeline.honey.name: Honey Shaders
config.honey.help.tone_mapping: Enables tone mapping which brings out more detail in bright parts of the screen.
config.honey.help.stylized_water: When true, uses an animated and cartoony water texture instead of the default.
config.honey.help.stylized_lava: When true, uses a custom noise generated lava texture instead of the default.
config.honey.help.inbuilt_materials: Enables built in material shaders included in the pack. If you want to use your own material shaders, ;disable this option and put your resource pack above Honey Shaders in resource pack selection screen.
config.honey.help.fog_enabled: Whether or not fog is enabled.
config.honey.help.enable_bloom: Whether or not bloom is enabled. ;Medium performance cost.
config.honey.help.boosted_bloom: When enabled, basically does bloom twice in a row, doubling the amount of passes but making things glow much more intensely.;For those who like intense glow. ;High performance cost.
config.honey.help.bloom_style: Emissivity is based on the blocklight's emissive value, luminance is based on the brightness of pixels on the screen and is WIP. ;No performance cost.
config.honey.help.bright_bloom: When true, applies bloom to color values that are too bright to show on the screen. ;Not needed when bloom style is set to luminance, but can help when set to emissivity.
config.honey.help.bloom_opacity: The opacity at which bloom is added on to the original image. ;Automatically halved when Boosted Bloom is enabled.
config.honey.help.bloom_quality: Quality of bloom. Samples = quality squared. Recommended to leave it at default unless you increase bloom radius. ;High performance cost.
config.honey.help.sunlight_emissivity: The value of the sun's emissivity. Used for bloom.
config.honey.help.moonlight_emissivity: The value of the moon's emissivity. Used for bloom.
config.honey.help.auto_exposure: Lowers the bloom intensity the more bright bloom is on the screen. Performance cost is not linear. 0 to disable.
config.honey.help.hunger_desaturation: Desaturates the screen when hunger effect is active.
config.honey.help.fire_resistance_tint: Tints the lightmap red when fire resistance effect is active.
config.honey.help.water_breathing_tint: Tints the lightmap blue when water breathing effect is active.
config.honey.help.underwater_blur_amt: The amount at which the screen is blurred underwater. ;0 to disable.
config.honey.help.translucent_blur_amt: The amount at which the screen is blurred behind translucents. ;0 to disable.
config.honey.help.among_us: When true, adds among us overlay to the screen.
config.honey.help.trans_sky: When true, adds trans flag overlay to the sky.
config.honey.help.drunk_shaders: When true, adds some extra crazy. Don't use this if you get dizzy or epileptic!
config.honey.help.red_mood_tint: When true, tints the lightmap and emissive color red the longer the player is underground, ;becoming more and more red and peaking when a spooky cave sound plays. ;Added during Halloween.
config.honey.help.rainbow_fog: Changes the color of foggier fog to be animated rainbow color. Requires fog style to be set to either Foggier Fog or Both.
config.honey.help.highlight_snow: Activates a material shader for Powder Snow which makes it easier to tell the difference from normal snow.
